subject: Order #SSN5223
description_text:
Hi,

Please can you tell me where my parcel is, when i track it i get
the following message: *The following waybills have not been collected or
have been shipped for more than 3 months: SF6047201467860*

Thanks
Hayden

conversations.body_text:
Please can i have a reply, its been 2 days since i opened the ticket...
where is my item?
Please can i have a response on this

Hi Hayden Sweet,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the VAM Pro, and your order will be shipped as soon as possible.Â
Ok, Do you know how long it will take to dispatch?
Can i have an update please?

Hi Hayden Sweet,  I apologize for the delayed response.  Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive around the 19th. Below is your package tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201467860

No problem, thank you for the update.

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 08:53, service@simsonn.com
Hi Hayden Sweet,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
